data.text:
Careers in CCISD

We know finding the right position is critical to your work and life balance. We also know that a job description doesn't always share the amazing things you will be able to accomplish as a team member at CCISD. We are proud to highlight the important work of various members of the CCISD team—what they really do, how they really grow, and how happy they really are at CCISD.

Why You Should Join Our Team

How to Apply for an Open Position

We are honored you have decided to apply for a position on our team. We are dedicated to your professional and personal growth and trust that you will have the opportunity to flourish at CCISD.

We hire throughout the year with our peak seasons for educators from March-August and November-December. All open positions are posted on our job board.

It all begins with an application. Once you submit an application for an open position, you will be contacted should you meet the requirements needed for the position. Be sure to apply for each position you are qualified for. Positions are available until they are removed from our hiring site. Finally, your information will remain in our applicant tracking system for one year after applying for a position.

APPLY NOW

Betterment Not Just Benefits

At CCISD, we are focused on you and dedicated to your personal and professional enrichment. Of course, we have the standard benefits—competitive salaries, comprehensive health packages, professional development—but we also offer betterment in the form of social and emotional support to all CCISD team members.

All CCISD employees are automatically enrolled in our Employee Assistance Program (EAP) that provides a wealth of resources to help you navigate life—free counseling, access to financial and legal advice, stress management techniques, and so much more. We host monthly workshops through EAP focused on relevant support to the current landscape.
